titleStmt.title: By the Protector. A declaration of His Highness for a day of publique fasting and humiliation.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1658-1660 : R. Cromwell)
Cromwell, Richard, 1626-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field, Printers to His Highness the Lord Protector,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at White-Hall this twenty fourth day of September, in the year of our Lord God, one thousand six hundred fifty and eight.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
